newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuelan stocks hit fourth straight record.
newsitem.headline: Venezuelan stocks hit fourth straight record.

text.p: Investors postponed profit- taking to take Caracas share prices rose to their fourth consecutive record high, traders said, with stocks continuing to be strongly bid by foreign investors.

The market's 19-share IBC index gained 0.30 percent to close at 5,060.10 points, according to preliminary figures from the stock exchange, as over 18 million shares traded worth 3.6 billion bolivars ($7.6 million).
